issues.description: Public function 'main' lacks a docstring
issues.suggestion: Add a docstring describing what the function does

issues.description: README references non-existent file: discover-tests.py
issues.suggestion: Update or remove reference to 'discover-tests.py' in README

issues.description: README references non-existent file: host-services/slack-notifier/README.md
issues.suggestion: Update or remove reference to 'host-services/slack-notifier/README.md' in README

issues.description: README references non-existent file: CLAUDE.md
issues.suggestion: Update or remove reference to 'CLAUDE.md' in README

issues.description: References non-existent file docs/adr/adr-autonomous-engineer-session.md
issues.suggestion: Update to docs/adr/in-progress/ADR-Autonomous-Software-Engineer.md

issues.description: References host-services/sync/github-sync/ which does not exist; actual service is host-services/analysis/github-watcher/
issues.suggestion: Update references to use correct path: host-services/analysis/github-watcher/

issues.line_hint: lines 68, 91 - except Exception as e blocks
issues.description: Bare 'except Exception as e' in document processing could mask unexpected errors
issues.suggestion: Narrow to specific exceptions: except (OSError, IOError, UnicodeDecodeError) as e:

issues.description: Unhandled exception in ticket file processing could stop entire watch; bare except clause
issues.suggestion: Add explicit exception handling around ticket_file.stat() and read_text()

issues.description: Unquoted shell variables ($worktree, $original_repo, $container_dir) could cause word splitting with special characters
issues.suggestion: Quote all variables using "${var}" pattern throughout the script

issues.description: cd command result not checked before subsequent git operations
issues.suggestion: Add: cd "$original_repo" || { log "Error: cd failed"; continue; }

issues.description: References legacy config location ~/.config/jib-notifier/config.json instead of consolidated ~/.config/jib/config.yaml
issues.suggestion: Replace all references to ~/.config/jib-notifier/ with ~/.config/jib/

issues.description: Setup instructions reference legacy config location ~/.config/jib-notifier/config.json
issues.suggestion: Update to reference consolidated config at ~/.config/jib/

issues.description: confluence-watcher.py is 98% identical to jib-container/watchers/context-watcher/confluence-watcher.py (219 lines duplicated)
issues.suggestion: Consolidate into shared/watchers/confluence_watcher.py and import from both locations

issues.description: jira-watcher.py is 100% identical to jib-container/watchers/context-watcher/jira-watcher.py (185 lines duplicated)
issues.suggestion: Consolidate into shared/watchers/jira_watcher.py and import from both locations

issues.description: JIRA connector reimplements _load_sync_state/_save_sync_state that BaseConnector already provides (95% identical)
issues.suggestion: Remove duplicate methods and inherit from BaseConnector

issues.description: Uses snake_case 'base.py' instead of kebab-case; too generic a name
issues.suggestion: Rename to connector-base.py or base-connector.py for consistency with project conventions

issues.description: Uses snake_case 'sync.py' instead of kebab-case; too generic a name
issues.suggestion: Rename to jira-sync.py for consistency with project conventions

issues.description: Directory naming inconsistent: lowercase directories with kebab-case files (inconsistent with watchers/ pattern)
issues.suggestion: Rename to confluence-watcher/ and jira-watcher/ for consistency

issues.description: RequestException catches too broadly; should distinguish timeouts from auth/network errors
issues.suggestion: Split into: except (requests.Timeout, requests.ConnectionError, requests.HTTPError):

issues.description: Hard-coded list limits ([:10] and [:5]) silently drop documents without warning
issues.suggestion: Add logging: if len(adr_files) > 10: logger.warning(f'Limiting ADRs to first 10 of {len(adr_files)}')

issues.description: References ./jib --reset but flag existence not verified in codebase
issues.suggestion: Verify jib CLI supports --reset flag or update to correct flag name
